title:
Hello team,
When trying to create an org in staging I'm getting an error, is this expected?
content:
=== Earlier conversation (context, already processed) ===
[2025-12-03T12:36:31.132Z] Panagiotis: Hello team,
When trying to create an org in staging I'm getting an error, is this expected?
[2025-12-03T14:28:13.772Z] Jordan Maduro: yeah this is still happening
[2025-12-03T14:46:01.273Z] Jordan Maduro: Cant see the issue do see a drop in database connections a couple of hours ago
[2025-12-03T16:08:45.705Z] Chandler: looks like this is back up and rolling!
[2025-12-03T20:00:24.786Z] Panagiotis: Just tried to setup an account in staging and I'm still getting the same error. Is there a known workaround?

```⚠️ Database connection unavailable```
:thinking_face:
[2025-12-03T20:01:08.716Z] Chandler: interesting — looking now
[2025-12-03T20:01:54.207Z] Chandler: very odd, I just successfully created a new tenant :thinking_face:
[2025-12-03T20:03:08.071Z] Chandler: oh wait hang on — it appeared successful
[2025-12-03T20:03:14.690Z] Chandler: seeing this now:
```{
    "error": "Database connection unavailable",
    "details": "Could not establish database connection for your organization"
}```
[2025-12-03T20:03:31.376Z] Chandler: ```GET <https://stg.getgrapevine.ai/api/tenant/status>```
is returning a 500
[2025-12-03T20:03:33.468Z] Panagiotis: ```rrweb-plugin-console-record.js:2447 Error polling tenant status: ApiError: Database connection unavailable
    at g3e.httpRequest (index-ConCl4xo.js:65:6076)
    at async g3e.get (index-ConCl4xo.js:65:6265)
    at async _ (index-ConCl4xo.js:80:105480)
(anonymous)	@	rrweb-plugin-console-record.js:2447```
That's the error I see in the console, when trying to setup a completely new one... like new email alias etc.
[2025-12-03T20:08:25.281Z] Chandler: yep investigating this now!
[2025-12-03T20:08:57.575Z] Chandler: can connect to
• control DB (supabase)
• tenant DB (postgres)
steward provisioning doesn't have any errors
[2025-12-03T20:10:43.732Z] Chandler: appears to be this: <https://onenr.io/0ERPV7lY2QW>
[2025-12-03T20:11:27.081Z] Chandler: missing SSM credentials: <https://onenr.io/0Zw0ezvyORv>
[2025-12-03T20:11:50.123Z] Chandler: this explains why things are still working for an existing tenant
[2025-12-03T20:12:28.082Z] Chandler: <@U09GSLBDYR5> what was our SSM param limit again?
[2025-12-03T20:14:22.333Z] Chandler: oh wow in fact there are no SSM params being stored
[2025-12-03T20:14:37.642Z] Chandler: so this makes sense: <https://onenr.io/0MRNonPLGjn>
[2025-12-03T20:15:02.180Z] Chandler: even though steward didn't error out here: <https://onenr.io/0vjANmeo3QP>
[2025-12-03T20:15:07.756Z] Chandler: > "Successfully stored parameter /2c05edec7af04101/credentials/postgresql/db_name"
[2025-12-03T20:15:41.743Z] Johnny D: fwiw doesn't look like we're at limit
[2025-12-03T20:16:04.187Z] Chandler: where did you go for that ui just for future ref?
[2025-12-03T20:16:15.363Z] Johnny D: <https://us-east-1.console.aws.amazon.com/servicequotas/home/services/ssm/quotas?region=us-east-1>
[2025-12-03T20:17:01.460Z] Chandler: ok so something wrong here with steward claiming it stored param, when it actually didn't (or maybe it did then got deleted or something)
[2025-12-03T20:18:16.176Z] Chandler: oh wait -- johnny is this just an ephemeral tenant?
[2025-12-03T20:19:11.239Z] Chandler: re `namespace_name:"devenv-jdallas-test"` <@U08CM2PLRAS>
[2025-12-03T20:19:16.608Z] Johnny D: oh what hm
[2025-12-03T20:20:20.584Z] Johnny D: that's odd - thats the namespace for the first devenv I made, when testing locally. It shouldn't be live anymore. I'm not sure exactly whats going on there but I would expect its unrelated to <@U01KFT6HUNS>’ issue
[2025-12-03T20:20:43.345Z] Chandler: yep for sure just got unlucky with the tenant ID looks like
[2025-12-03T20:21:28.717Z] Chandler: is it weird that tenant made requests recently tho? <https://onenr.io/0MRNonPLGj>
[2025-12-03T20:21:53.193Z] Chandler: will let you run that down if its a thing ha

=== New messages since last pass (process these) ===
[2025-12-03T20:22:41.461Z] Johnny D: yeah I'll dig into that
